events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected. I want to request a refund immediately.
The case was reviewed and categorized under Refund because the customer requested money back for the product.
The customer service agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also describe the reason for your refund in more detail so we can process it efficiently?
Order number is 123456789. The product doesn't match the description, and Iâ€™m not satisfied with its quality. Please process the refund soon.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. You will receive the amount back in 5-7 business days. We will also send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful information. I appreciate the prompt service and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund case has been resolved on our end, and the refund is processing. Please check your payment method within a week.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since you confirmed receiving the refund, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime for further assistance.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback regarding the refund process and overall experience.
